title: Salesforce Targets Agent Sprawl Increase in Latest MuleSoft Expansion
summary: Salesforce is targeting an increase in agent sprawl with its latest MuleSoft expansion, in response to the expected growth of actively deployed AI agents worldwide to over 1 billion by 2029. This development could significantly impact the landscape of ITSM, ITOM, HRSM, ESM, and EX, necessitating adjustments in their strategies and roadmaps.
hook: Salesforce's MuleSoft expansion targets AI agent sprawl growth.

title: EU Regulation Puts WhatsApp Channels Firmly on the Compliance Radar
summary: As WhatsApp Channels expand across Europe, customer engagement via messaging is entering a more regulated phase due to new EU regulations. This could impact ITSM, ITOM, HRSM, ESM, and EX buyers who use or plan to use WhatsApp for business communication and need to ensure compliance.
hook: EU regulation impacts WhatsApp Channels: Compliance implications for ES.

title: Health systems urge TEFCA, Carequality to employ stricter privacy controls
summary: Over 60 health systems have urged TEFCA and Carequality to implement stricter privacy and security controls to protect patients' medical information. This call for enhanced privacy practices could influence ES vendors to strengthen their own data protection measures, impacting ITSM, ITOM, HRSM, ESM, and EX buyers.
hook: Health systems demand stricter privacy controls from data exchange frameworks.
